titles.title: To extend until January 1, 1998, the existing suspension of duty on certain bicycle parts, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E444)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 2/24/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1997, the suspension of duty on certain bicycle parts and accessories. Amends the Foreign Trade Zones Act to extend, through December 31, 1997, the exemption from the customs laws for bicycle component parts that are reexported from the United States, whether or not in the original package, as components of a completely assembled bicycle.
